title: League Haikus
body:
I'm encouraging people to think of and post champ related, map related, or item related 5 7 5 haikus.  I'll start with a few, try to guess them.

Best lore on the game
A relatable monster
Oh crap! Shurima!

I'll place a shroom here
In the river, Dragon, base
Gank me I dare you

Pushing in all day
Shred tanks with my W
Suppression OP

.....
.......
.....

Sonic the hedgehog
Can't escape he will taunt you
While saying ok

Stacking all day long
I will never gank you, bro 
Come out support strong (an item one)

the moon rises, too
Q R Q R Q R Q
A fun assassin

replies.body:
All my heath is gone
I shouldn't face check bushes
Wish Kayle ulted me
Every ADC with a bad support that doesn't ward? :D
You can also ward up as an ADC :P Although, I do agree, supports are (at least early game) your main source of wards.

I think everybody should spend some time as a support. This way, they realize how much the support can contribute to warding, and how much everybody else needs to assist with it. I main support, so I soon realized that I want my ADC to trinket ward the side brush so we don't get Blitz grabbed or lose line of sight during a fight, and mid can help everyone by putting a pink in the river. Realizing this as a support, I now spend a little on wards in every role :3

Don't get me wrong I wasn't bashing on Supports. I main Support. I was simply saying every ADC has that thought " Oh my support didn't ward, and we got ganked. - His/her fault for not warding." I see that so many times its ridiculous.
Even when I venture off and go ADC I ward just as much as my support in the early game till they get warding Items.  

I just find it funny, Riot put warding trinkets {{item:3340}}  in the game, and people still don't ward.

I know you weren't bashing anyone. Just saying that I gained a greater appreciation and understanding of warding outside of the Support role after I had started maining Support providing the vast majority of wards for the team.

Now when I play any other role, I pick up a Pink ward to place defensively to prevent counter jungling, and often a couple Greens before my level 9 yellow trinket. I still don't swap to Sweeper as non-support roles like the pros do, though. My gold farming isn't as good as theirs so I can't afford to drop the yellow trink, or at least that's my excuse.

> All my health is gone
> I shouldn't face check bushes
> Wish Kayle ulted me

{{champion:86}}
I cry every time a Garen pops out of a bush. 9/10 times, I'm dead.
is it {{champion:17}}? i'm not the best at these.
Teemo was the original inspiration for this. :3  I figured it would be taken several ways! Like, face checking an ARAM bush!

Gonna play ARAM
Hope I get a decent champ
Crap, I main jungle

Bad luck, roll Rammus
Enemy team all ranged champs
Should have dodged, oh well

Glorious Battle
My blade is drinking their blood
I will never die
I thought {{champion:266}}

ADC I swear
By the stars I'll protect you!
Great, now heal me bitch.

Farming in bot lane
My support stole every kill
Best teammate ever
{{champion:16}}  and {{champion:1}} .
{{champion:37}} {{item:3100}}

Wait, all in good time
Eternal slow just for you
Tick tock tick tock boom

I will answer all of these muhahaha.

{{champion:26}}

I am almost dead
When I ult on your team
Lifesteal will save me

Destruction is fun
I will destroy Piltover
I have many guns

My hammer is great
My hair flows like a river
Gems are outrageous
that last one is clearly Hextech {{champion:14}}
Close, first one is supposed to be Fiora.

Being big fans of Diana and Leona, I've come up with a Haiku from some of their in game quotes, with a slight alteration to Leona's to fit the syllable pattern:

Chosen of the moon
Twilight fades; Dawn has arrived 
They leave me no choice

Riot, why you do this
I'm keep on buying rp
Good bye my wallet

Kill me? You can try
Ton! Face the wind! Hasagi!
Ton! Sorye Ge Ton!

1 New Yasuo skin
2 {{champion:157}}

I will now press R
Top lane, you are much too low
The Diamond plays.

{{champion:30}}

qqqqq
qqqqqqq
rito bring back urf
{{champion:76}} Amiright? Lol Spears for days.
{{champion:6}} nidalee, please...

~~isn't {{champion:33}} a boy? 0_o~~

but any who;

i am gardian,
protector of the temple,
my spirit lives on.

fighting for glory.
making a path for oneself.
crush all in your path.

my pet wants to play,
he is my favorite bear.
he gives me warmth.
3{{champion:1}}

To heal and protect
I wish to restore your health
I throw bananas

I'm gold and give gold
Upgrade me, I'll speed you up
A support's best friend

I control the tides
Water to heal and damage
Watch out for my stun

Throwing boomerangs
Be careful of my temper
The cutest Yordle

Whimsical yordles,
Tasty yordles. For Breakfast.
Now Cho' is max stacks.

Mundo not sure how
Haiku work. Counting is hard.
Always be cleavin'.

My power boundless
Arcane form with no weakness
I have ascended

Fluffy animal
I would have loved to tame you
Eat, eat and grow strong

For I have returned
Shurima, my empire
Will now rise again.

One strike away from death
No escaping Yasuo
My last breath was that

Mother back home said
Drink Goat's Milk and get stronger
You always bring Braum

One button for death
One for defying death's grasp
and One for rocking

Rocking good hairstyle
Very annoying turrets
You beg for mercy

{{champion:98}} Loyalty is but a
Flower in the winds of
Fear and temptation.
___
Do I get a cookie for the reference?

Tryndamere crits me
I got smashed into the ground
Rito pls why now

Put me in a bush
Hopefully you hid me well
Vision all game long

My zenith blade lands
Death Lotus has been ended
Try to leave a dent

{{champion:89}}

Facecheck. Check.
Found enemies. Check.
Died. They did.
Why? GODYR

infinite power
never again restrained
just try to stop me!
{{champion:134}} 

promising garden
no-one shall escape my grasp
I'm dead? You're too!
{{champion:143}}

The Jungle, my home.
Click R for advanc'd darkness
Suddenly, an ace.

Nightmare for the world
Trails of dusk bring me to you
Fitful sleep, and death.

What do you think?
{{champion:56}} For the win!

Eclipse zenith shield,
The way to initiate with,
The greatest tank.
